node.title: Meet Generation Z
node.description:
A new initiative by the youth department to start youth and young adult ministries at the local church level. Our goal is to empower people to initiate meaningful projects in their local communities that connect them with each other, the Adventist church, and God...Meet Generation Z: One out of every four Americans are one. This session will discuss who they

are, why the devil hates them, and how God can use this generation to usher in His Second Coming.
